mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, N.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY nseq DESC) N) WHERE rn >= #{startNum}) WHERE rn <= #{endNum}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, E.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM event ORDER BY eseq DESC) E) WHERE rn >= #{startNum}) WHERE rn <= #{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into notice ( nseq, subject , content) values( nseq.nextVal, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.update: update notice set subject=#{subject},content=#{content} where nseq=#{nseq}
mapper.insert: insert into event ( eseq, subject , image) values( eseq.nextVal, #{subject}, #{image})
mapper.update: update event set subject=#{subject},image=#{image} where eseq=#{eseq}
